attributes.action: Have separate praying rooms for Muslims in every school.
attributes.additional_details: I believe we should have two praying rooms/classes in every school for Muslim students to pray in. Teachers do not allow students to leave school ground in order to go to Mosques and pray which means they should provide them with a separate room to pray in their free time. The government should make every school in the UK build or keep two classrooms for the Muslim students to pray in.
